dependency_installation.notes: Dependencies resolved and installed successfully. Warning about deprecated tool.uv.dev-dependencies field is non-critical.

module_import.notes: All modules imported successfully. pygame-ce is properly initialized.

application_launch.notes: Application launched and ran successfully without crashes or errors.

player_movement.notes: Player can move in all four directions (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT) and movement is properly constrained by maze boundaries.

wall_collision.notes: Wall detection works correctly. Player cannot move through walls.

coin_detection.notes: Coins are properly detected on the grid

coin_collection.notes: Coin collection mechanic works correctly. Coins are removed from grid and score is updated.

grid_system.notes: Grid-based movement system works as designed.

enemy_ai.notes: Koopa enemies implement back-and-forth patrol behavior.

game_states.notes: Game state management is properly implemented.

ui_elements.notes: UI displays all required game information.

input_handling.notes: Keyboard input handling is properly implemented.

visual_elements.ui: text overlays for score, lives, timer, coins

rendering.notes: Rendering system uses pygame drawing primitives for monochrome high-contrast visual style.

warnings.message: The `tool.uv.dev-dependencies` field in pyproject.toml is deprecated. Consider using `dependency-groups.dev` instead.

recommendations.suggestion: Update pyproject.toml to use dependency-groups.dev instead of tool.uv.dev-dependencies

summary: The Vector Super Mario Bros Maze Coin Hunt application successfully starts and all core functionality has been verified. The game initializes correctly with proper player positioning, coin placement, enemy configuration, and game state management. Player movement, wall collision detection, and coin collection mechanics all function as expected. The application is ready for use.
